titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller University, Union Church (Pocantico Hills, New York), Collection of images of Marc Chagall windows records
A Guide to the Rockefeller University, Union Church (Pocantico Hills, New York), Collection of images of Marc Chagall windows FA238

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2015-09-18 19:27:39 -0400.

change.item: Paper finding aid converted to EAD/XML by AureXus in 2010. Imported into the Archvists’ Toolkit by Becky Robbins.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller University, Union Church (Pocantico Hills, New York), Collection of images of Marc Chagall windows

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Union Church of Pocantico Hills (Pocantico Hills, N.Y.)

did.physdesc: Exhibit brochure and 27 envelopes of 8 × 10 negatives / prints; (2.5" letter)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A Special Collection of the Rockefeller University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Material received from Cynthia B. Altman, Art Curator, 11 November 1982.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Materials requiring specialized equipment for access (film, audio, video, slides) may be closed to research dependent on availability of the applicable equipment
Brittle or damaged items, or materials otherwise in need of preservation care, may be closed to researchers at the discretion of the RAC Head of Archival Services/Head of Reference.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for scholarly research.

controlaccess.corpname: Union Church of Pocantico Hills (Pocantico Hills, N.Y.)

did.unittitle: Brochure. "Nine Windows by Chagall" The Museum of Modern Art
Studies and sketches for Union Church windows

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Cataloging numbers from envelope sleeves: folder 2 DR 21.228 TR 4044.23 Keller 1023; folder 2 DR 21.229 TR 4044.24 Keller 1024; folder 2 DR 21.230 TR 4044.25 Keller 1025; folder 2 DR 21.231 TR 4044.26 Keller 1026; folder 2 DR 21.232 TR 4044.27 Keller 1027; folder 3 DR 21.233 TR 4044.6 Keller 1006; folder 3 DR 21.234 TR 4044.5 Keller 1005; folder 3 DR 21.235 TR 4044.3 Keller 1003; folder 3 DR 21.236 TR 4044.7 Keller 1007; folder 3 DR 21.237 [No TR #] Keller 1004 "The Crucifixion..."; folder 4 DR 21.238 TR 4044.2 Keller 1002 "Seek and Ye Shall Find..."; folder 4 DR 21.239 TR 4044.1 Keller 1001; folder 4 DR 21.240 TR 4044.22 Keller 1022; folder 4 DR 21.241 TR 4044.19 Keller 1019; folder 4 DR 21.242 TR 4044.18 Keller 1018; folder 5 DR 21.243 [No TR #] Keller 1017 Isaiah; folder 5 DR 21.244 [No TR #] Keller 1016 Ezekiel; folder 5 DR 21.245 [No TR #] Keller 1015 Cherubim; folder 5 DR 21.246 [No TR #] Keller 1014 Daniel; folder 5 DR 21.247 [No TR #] Keller 1013 Elijah; folder 6 DR 21.248 [No TR #] Keller 1012 Jeremiah; folder 6 DR 21.249 [No TR #] Keller 1011 Joel; folder 6 DR 21.250 [No TR #] Keller 1020; folder 6 DR 21.251 [No TR #] Keller 1021; folder 6 DR 21.252 [No TR #] Keller 1010 Good Samaritan; folder 7 DR 21.253 TR 4044.8 Keller 1008; folder 7 DR 21.254 TR 4044.9 Keller 1009
